statements: SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medication WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Medication WHERE medication_id = 3;
SELECT medication_id, medication_name, date_prescribed FROM Medication WHERE date_prescribed >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medication WHERE patient_id = 2 ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT medication_name, patient_id, date_prescribed AS prescribed_date FROM Medication WHERE medication_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Medication WHERE dosage > 10 ORDER BY date_prescribed DESC, medication_name
SELECT medication_name, dosage, date_prescribed FROM Medication WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY medication_name ASC
SELECT medication_name, patient_id FROM Medication WHERE dosage < 5 OR dosage > 15 ORDER BY patient_id, medication_name DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS unique_patients, AVG(dosage) AS average_dosage FROM Medication GROUP BY medication_name HAVING AVG(dosage) > 10
SELECT medication_name, MAX(dosage) AS max_dosage, MIN(dosage) AS min_dosage FROM Medication GROUP BY medication_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2 ORDER BY max_dosage DESC
SELECT * FROM medication_usage
SELECT medication_name, dosage, timestamp FROM medication_usage WHERE patient_id = 123
SELECT patient_id, medication_name FROM medication_usage ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT MAX(dosage), MIN(dosage), AVG(dosage) FROM medication_usage GROUP BY medication_name
SELECT medication_name, SUM(dosage) AS total_dosage FROM medication_usage GROUP BY medication_name HAVING total_dosage > 100
SELECT * FROM medication_usage WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medication_usage WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY dosage ASC;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage, timestamp FROM medication_usage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, administered_dosage, reconciliation_date FROM medication_reconciliation WHERE prescribed_dosage != administered_dosage AND reconciliation_date < '2022-03-15';
SELECT MAX(dosage) AS max_dosage, MIN(dosage) AS min_dosage FROM medication_usage GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT * FROM Medications;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE frequency = 'daily';
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT medication_id, dosage_taken, date_taken FROM MedicationHistory ORDER BY date_taken DESC;
SELECT MAX(dosage_taken) AS max_dosage FROM MedicationHistory;
SELECT * FROM Medications;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT m.medication_name, mh.dosage_taken, p.name FROM Medications m JOIN MedicationHistory mh ON m.id = mh.medication_id JOIN Patients p ON mh.patient_id = p.patient_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT mh.patient_id) as total_patients, SUM(m.dosage) as total_dosage FROM MedicationHistory mh JOIN Medications m ON mh.medication_id = m.id;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT id, name, dosage FROM medications ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, frequency FROM medications WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age < 30;
SELECT id, name, specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM medications LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, dosage FROM medications WHERE dosage > 100;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT p.name AS patient_name, m.name AS medication_name, pr.dosage FROM patients p JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.id = pr.patient_id JOIN medications m ON pr.medication_id = m.id;

SELECT d.name AS doctor_name, COUNT(p.id) AS num_patients FROM doctors d LEFT JOIN prescriptions pr ON d.id = pr.doctor_id LEFT JOIN patients p ON pr.patient_id = p.id GROUP BY d.id ORDER BY num_patients DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Patient ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patient WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT Medication.medication_name, Medication.dosage_amount, Prescription.start_date FROM Medication INNER JOIN Prescription ON Medication.medication_id = Prescription.medication_id;

SELECT Patient.first_name, Doctor.first_name, Doctor.last_name FROM Patient INNER JOIN PatientDoctor ON Patient.patient_id = PatientDoctor.patient_id INNER JOIN Doctor ON PatientDoctor.doctor_id = Doctor.doctor_id ORDER BY Patient.first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Patient WHERE date_of_birth < '1980-01-01';
SELECT Medication.medication_name, Prescription.dosage_amount FROM Medication JOIN Prescription ON Medication.medication_id = Prescription.medication_id;

SELECT Patient.first_name, PatientDoctor.doctor_id, Doctor.first_name FROM Patient JOIN PatientDoctor ON Patient.patient_id = PatientDoctor.patient_id JOIN Doctor ON PatientDoctor.doctor_id = Doctor.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM Medication WHERE frequency LIKE 'Daily%' ORDER BY dosage_amount DESC;
